name: Echo
short_description:
Echo aims to be a lightweight, cross platform audio player using C++ and Qt.

The current goals of this project are:  

-To be able to play any number of file formats using plugins.

-To be able to output to assorted platform specific audio systems.

-To have a simple, yet, functional user interface.

-To avoid the all-in-one "iTunes" style mentality of some audio players.

-To to focus on file format compatibility and not video, external device, or on-line services.

-To have fast, stable, and well designed code.
